statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); if [ -w "$current_dir" ]; then dir_info=$(basename "$current_dir"); else dir_info="$(basename "$current_dir") ro"; fi; if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then branch=$(cd "$current_dir" && git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); git_info=" git $branch"; else git_info=""; fi; model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); printf "%s%s [%s]" "$dir_info" "$git_info" "$model_name"
